text: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Manipur (IIIT Manipur) is an Indian Institute of Information Technology that will be permanently located in the Senapati district of Manipur. However, classes have commenced from July 2015 at a temporary campus in Mantripukhri, Imphal.It is among the 20 IIIT’s proposed under Non-profit Public-Private Partnership (PPP) Model by Ministry of Human Resource Development (India). IIITM is an academic and research Institute fully funded by Government of India,List of institutes funded by the Central Government of India Government of Manipur and Industry partner Manipur IT SEZ Project Development Company. ==References== ==External links== Manipur Category:Engineering colleges in Manipur
title: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Manipur
